description: Project relies on a single Backend Developer for critical security-sensitive tasks (JWT auth, `isolated-vm` sandbox) and a single DevOps engineer for all infrastructure. Unavailability of either resource would halt progress.
mitigation_strategy: Mandate pair programming for complex tasks. Enforce thorough documentation. Conduct internal knowledge-sharing sessions.
contingency_plan: Engage a pre-vetted external consultant on short notice to fill the skill gap.
monitoring_trigger: Git commit history shows only one developer contributing to a critical module.

description: The team has no dedicated QA resource for Sprints 2-4, increasing the risk of bugs being discovered late in the development cycle. The single QA engineer is a bottleneck in Sprints 1 and 5.
mitigation_strategy: Implement a 'shift-left' testing culture by training and requiring developers to write their own E2E tests for each feature.
contingency_plan: Allocate a budget for a part-time manual testing contractor for pre-release hardening.
monitoring_trigger: Increase in bug count discovered in the sprint following development.
